title: Pepsi Logo/Virgin Megastores Logo
content:
Can anyone help me annotate these two logos. I need to comment on the formal elements such as shape, colour, composition, balance etc. and state why they are in this way. Suggestions would be helpful or names of books or websites.   
THANK YOU
author: invincible

comments.content:
Hi, I think you can find your logos here. They are all available in EPS format.   
   
 [http://logo.nino.ru](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013165200/http:/logo.nino.ru/)   
   
Hope I could help. Be careful with copyrights though!
Oeps, did not read your post the right way, i thought you needed the logos.
[This thread has been moved to Design]
